org.codehaus.mojo.buildmetadata
Class MetaDataReport

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
          org.codehaus.mojo.buildmetadata.MetaDataReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
@Mojo(name="metadatareport",
      requiresProject=true,
      requiresReports=true,
      defaultPhase=SITE,
      threadSafe=true)
public class MetaDataReport
extends org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport

Retrieve current username and place it under a configurable project property

Author:
Karl-Heinz Marbaise

outputDirectory

private File outputDirectory
The output directory for the report. Note that this parameter is only evaluated if the goal is run directly from the command line. If the goal is run indirectly as part of a site generation, the output directory configured in the Maven Site Plugin is used instead.
